DOC.brief_summary: The goal of this prospective study is to evaluate the feasibility of the 22-G Core Biopsy Needle with reverse bevel (Procore TM) in biopsy sampling of subepithelial tumors of the upper gastrointestinal tract.
DOC.brief_title: 22-G-Procore Needle for the Diagnosis of SETs of the Upper GI Tract
DOC.criteria: 1. Patient age 18 years and older 2. All patients with subepithelial tumors of the upper GI tract (maximum size: 3 cm) 1. Unable to obtain informed consent 2. ASA class 4 or 5 3. known pregnancy 4. contraindication endoscopy 5. contraindication for taking biopsies
